import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { School, BarChart3, FileText, UploadCloud, FileIcon, X, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const ReevaluationForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ course: '', examDate: '', currentMarks: '', expectedMarks: '', reason: '', }); const [files, setFiles] = useState([ { name: 'exam_paper_scan.pdf', size: '1.2 MB' } // Initial mock file ]); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const removeFile = (index) => { setFiles(files.filter((_, i) => i !== index)); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Submitting Request:', { ...formData, files }); alert('Request Submitted Successfully!'); }; return (
